## Worm.getTestingTime() method

Get the current testing time.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTestingTime(threads: number, player?: Player): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threads | number |  |
|  player | [Player](./bitburner.player.md) | _(Optional)_ The player to get the testing time for. If not specified, the current player is used. |

**Returns:**

number

The current testing time in milliseconds for the specified threads.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.5 GB
